name: Goodbye Cometa
description:
GAME AVALAIBLE IN ENGLISH & SPANISH

Kite, a guardian angel must decide if his chosen deserves to continue to exist in his current world despite its decaying state.

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->

Kite, un ángel guardián deberá decidir si su elegido merece seguir existiendo en su mundo actual a pesar de su decadente estado.

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->
